title: Moving to Arlington after college? Let’s meet up!
text: Hello, I’m graduating from university in May, and barring the COVID-19 situation, I should be moving to Arlington (specifically Ballston) in early July. I’m worried about making friends/meeting people as I know absolutely N O B O D Y in the city and surrounding areas, and this is my first time moving to a large city alone! If this sounds like you, leave a comment and let’s see if we can get a meetup going for all us new grads!
